subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: N.H.L. players are bracing for the league’s fourth work stoppage. Pittsburgh’s Sidney Crosby says “it’s not looking great” for the season to start on time Oct. 11.
snippet: N.H.L. players are bracing for the league’s fourth work stoppage. Pittsburgh’s Sidney Crosby says “it’s not looking great” for the season to start on time Oct. 11.
